attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app completely broke my phone. Not only did it take an entire trump presidency to download, the second I opened the app, my phone crashed in ways I have never seen before. This clearly needs to be removed from the App Store.

attributes.title: Slowed my phone down :(

attributes.title: Flaming Garbage
attributes.review: App took forever to download, crashed my phone twice while trying to get the app to work, and had many spelling and grammar errors within the app that made it very hard to use. A very sad attempt at an app honestly.

attributes.title: DO NOT USE VERY SCARY
attributes.review: This app scared me when I got it. Even though it says 17+ this app can scare ANYONE! Some really scary orange Cheeto looking thing pops up on the screen and it made me pee my pants. Also I think this app hacks into your phone so be careful guys! Anyways- rate this a 1 Star because we need this horrifying app removed!
